creator: YeeZa
notes: This training pack will help improve your ability to react to fast passes and positioning your car for redirects. These shots are quite difficult at first so just keep trying to score each shot and then move on to the next one.If you are unsure of how to perform fast aerials, reverse aerials or helicopter twist aerials, I highly recommend that you watch the first minute of this video as I have added instructions on how to perform those moves. Have fun!
